home.heading: Choose a local Real Estate Agent that is recommended by other Real Estate Agents for the Neighbourhood you want advice for.
home.headingPartner: Choose a local Real Estate Agent that has been recommended by other Real Estate Agents for the neighbourhood your clients want to move to.
home.headingClient: Choose a local Real Estate Agent that has been recommended by other Real Estate Agents or Change the Agent to your Favorite and add to your Network Map

login.this_website_desc: This website is free to use for the Public and Realtors alike. If you are looking for someone in another City or Neighbourhood to help you or your clients, this web site is a quick resource to find someone who works in the neighbourhood you want. Just use the map or quick search to find your desired City or neighbourhood and a real estate agent who works there will be shown to you and you can connect with them in one click. They will be contacted and get back to you as soon as they can
login.the_Realtors_desc: The Realtors on this site have all been reviewed by their peers and have been recommended as someone you can trust to work with. Any concerns you can reach out to us and we are happy to assist you. We hope you enjoy.
login.password_must_be_at_least_6_characters: Password must be at least 6 characters

consumer_registration.this_website: This website is free to use for the Public and Realtors alike. If you are looking for someone in another City or Neighbourhood to help you or your clients, this web site is a quick resource to find someone who works in the neighbourhood you want. Just use the map or quick search to find your desired City or neighbourhood and a real estate agent who works there will be shown to you and you can connect with them in one click. They will be contacted and get back to you as soon as they can
consumer_registration.the_Realtors: The Realtors on this site have all been reviewed by their peers and have been recommended as someone you can trust to work with. Any concerns you can reach out to us and we are happy to assist you. We hope you enjoy the use of the site.
consumer_registration.you_have_been_Invited_to_join_My_Referra: You have been Invited to join My Referral Network
consumer_registration.your_friend_in_Real_estate: Your friend in Real Estate has asked you to be part of their network. This is a free service to Realtors to connect with their friends. We do not get involved in the referral transactions between agents. We just help you stay connected. If you check us out and want to join in, it is only $10.00 for the year and you can create your own referral network and keep it in this handy tool
consumer_registration.all_you_have_to_do_is: All you have to do is
consumer_registration.fill_in_all_the_information_required: Fill in all the information required. We suggest to fill in the Short Bio for sure. Also don’t be a bubble head. Upload a picture to be on the map. Fill in all the FSA areas you wish to serve. This will help you get more referrals down the road. Agree and Certify the information is correct

about_us.content1: We are a group of Real Estate Agents who want to help our colleagues connect and stay connected. By building this web site we are paying it forward as one way to help pass on the sucess we have had over the years. Every realtor who joins my referral network as a partner or client helps to make the system better for everyone. We all are working together to create the best and most current referral site of Real Estate Agents across Canada for every neighbourhood. You will know that the agents in the web site are ready and willing to take your referrals.
about_us.content2: Building your own network is part of a successful business and service to clients. We know over time you build a network of friends right across the country to refer your clients and recommend agent is onther areas to fellow agent you know. Keeping a quick site close by to help you keep your friends across the country in mind and know that they are there for you when you have a referral to recommed.
about_us.content3: Enjoy using the Site as a member of the public, Partner Realtor or Client Realtor.

about_us.help: We are here to help you with your referrals.
about_us.web: Any issues using the web site let us know.
about_us.website: The website is only as good as the feedback we get. Comments to help enhance, Ideas to improve, making things easier to use, these are all the things we would love to here about. Also if you have success with the website or like the options available give us a shout out as well. We enjoy the praise and will work hard to help you in your business of referrals.
about_us.about_new_contect: We are a groups of Real Estate agents that love passing it forward. Setting up newer agents with a full network of great agents in all areas of the country was one of the goals. The other was so that agents could stay in contact and find their friends and referral partners easily. A little bit of paying it forward for the good luck and fortunate acquaintances that have come to us in the past. WE have been fortunate to do well and happy to help others do the same. There is a small cost to keep things going so those who do join in get a great value and make the system successful by their support. The system being supported by all those who join in will help pass it forward as the participation of the agents and building their network will help the system continue to be relevant and work well for everyone. We all hope you enjoy the use of the system and that you find good value for your business and staying in contact with your friends. You can reach out to us through the contact page at any time.

contact_us.lorem_ipsum: Getting hold of us is easy.
contact_us.duis_aute: We are happy to respond to requests for help or information
contact_us.sed_ut_perspiciatis: If you want to connect, our team is ready to help. Ask us where you need help connecting with an Agent or if you are not sure your connection request went through. we can help. If you want to know more about how this site works we can arrange a call or email to help you out
contact_us.contact_us_for: Contact us for a quote, help or to join the team
contact_us.name: Name
contact_us.content: We are always open to conversation and willing to look at feedback and ideas to help the system out. Feel free to provide your ideas, send us your referral suggestions and if you are having any difficulties check in.
contact_us.phone_should_be_digit: Phone number should be 8 to 15 digit
contact_us.we_are_always_open: We are always open to conversation and willing to look at feedback and ideas to help the system out. Feel free to provide your ideas, send us your referral suggestions and if you are having any difficulties check in

realtor_registration.this_is_a_free_service_to_realtors: This is a free service to Realtors. Let us help you to find an agent working in a City or Neighbourhood that you want to help your clients find a home in areas you don’t serve. If you try the free service and want to build your network, sign up as a client or give us a shout. We would be happy to help you out
realtor_registration.If_you: If you want to build your own network map and network of Agents you can do so by becoming a client. Only $10.00 per year to access the system. We just need enough to keep updating the system.A very small cost to help you keep your network close at hand. If someone in your network decides that it is time to call it quits the system will always provide you with a neighbourhood Realtor that has been recommended by your peers
realtor_registration.yes_only: Yes only $10.00 per year. We just need enough to keep updating the system. A very small cost to help you keep your network close at hand. If someone in your network decides that it is time to call it quits the system will always provide you with a Realtor that has been recommended by your peers. If you try the free service and want to build your network, sign up or give a shout. We would be happy to help you out

realtor_registration.enter_all_the_fsa_areas: Enter all the FSA areas ( First three letters of postal codes) you serve. Enter up to 40 FSA areas. At least one area needs to be chosen.

client_registration.and_use_of_my: and use of my personal information
client_registration.this_website_is_free_to_use: For only $10.00 a year you can create your own referral network map and keep it in this handy tool. You will always have a great network of agents to recommend to your friends and clients. You will look like a star to introduce them to great agents across the country. There is Realtors in every neighborhood across Canada available for you to use or change them to your own referral partner. All the agents in the list have been recommended by fellow Realtors. Your own network will be on the map, and they will always be there for you. Any updates of information will be updated for you so the most recent information about your network partners will always be close at hand.
client_registration.the_realtors_on_this: All you have to do is: Fill in all the information required on the sign up form. Fill in all the FSA areas (First three digits of a postal code ie A4A) that you wish to serve. This will help you get more referrals down the road and maybe one day be the face on the public map. Once you Agree and Certify the information is correct, pay the $10.00 you will be approved and, on your way, to create your own map of agents across Canada.

V4B 2J3.

These Terms provide important information to you, including information about your obligations when using the Services, about content you access through the Services, about content you contribute to the Services, and about the limits of our liability to you. terms_conditions.Peddemors: Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation is not responsible for any errors in displayed information or delays in displaying information ON THE SITES, including without limitation any THIRD PARTY CONTENT. No Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation TAKES RESPONSIBILITY OR ASSUMES ANY LIABILITY FOR ANY THIRD PARTY CONTENT. ANY USE OR RELIANCE ON ANY THIRD PARTY CONTENT OR OTHER INFORMATION ON THE SERVICES OR OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE SERVICES IS AT YOUR OWN RISK, INCLUDING INFORMATION PROVIDED BY OR FOR A Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation. NO Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE ACTS OR OMISSIONS OF, OR ANY CONTENT OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY ANY THIRD PARTY, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, A MULTIPLE LISTING SERVICE OR AN AGENT PARTICIPATING IN THE REDFIN PARTNER PROGRAM.
terms_conditions.NO_Stewart: NO Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation IS RESPONSIBLE FOR, AND NO Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation MAKES ANY REPRESENTIONS OR WARRANTIES REGARDING, THE DELIVERY OF ANY MESSAGES (SUCH AS POSTING OF ANSWERS OR TRANSMISSION OF ANY CONTENT) SENT THROUGH THE SERVICES. NO Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation HAS ANY OBLIGATION TO VERIFY THE IDENTITY OF THE PERSONS USING ITS SERVICES, NOR DOES ANY Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation HAVE ANY OBLIGATION TO MONITOR THE USE OF ITS SERVICES. EACH Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation DISCLAIMS ALL LIABILITY FOR IDENTITY THEFT OR ANY OTHER MISUSE OF YOUR IDENTITY OR INFORMATION BY OTHERS.

terms_conditions.THE_VIEWS: THE VIEWS EXPRESSED ON THE SERVICES IN THIRD PARTY CONTENT, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, POSTS TO FORUMS, DO NOT NECESSARILY REPRESENT OR REFLECT THE VIEWS OF THE REDFIN COMPANIES. NO Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation IS RESPONSIBLE FOR, AND DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL LIABILITY IN RELATION TO THIRD PARTY CONTENT.
terms_conditions.Limitations: 2.11. Limitations of Liability. IN NO EVENT WILL ANY Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation OR ANY OF THEIR AGENTS, EMPLOYEES, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS OR REPRESENTATIVES BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF, BASED ON, OR RESULTING FROM THESE TERMS, THE AGREEMENT, OR YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES, EVEN IF A PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. THESE LIMITATIONS AND EXCLUSIONS APPLY WITHOUT REGARD TO WHETHER THE DAMAGES ARISE FROM (A) BREACH OF CONTRACT, (B) BREACH OF WARRANTY, (C) NEGLIGENCE, OR (D) ANY OTHER CAUSE OF ACTION, TO THE EXTENT SUCH EXCLUSION AND LIMITATIONS ARE NOT PROHIBITED BY APPLICABLE LAW. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ANY PART OF THIS AGREEMENT, OR YOU HAVE ANY DISPUTE OR CLAIM AGAINST A Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation, ITS AGENTS, EMPLOYEES, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS OR REPRESENTATIVES WITH RESPECT TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE SERVICES, THEN EXCEPT AS SPECIFICALLY PROVIDED IN THIS AGREEMENT OR WHERE THE LAW REQUIRES A DIFFERENT STANDARD, YOUR SOLE AND EXCLUSIVE REMEDY IS TO TERMINATE YOUR ACCOUNT FOR SUCH SERVICES, IF APPLICABLE, AND/OR DISCONTINUE USING THE SERVICES.
terms_conditions.Copyright: 2.12. Copyright and Intellectual Property Policy. The Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation respect the intellectual property rights of others and expect our users to do the same. It is the Redfin Companies' policy to terminate, in appropriate circumstances, account holders who repeatedly infringe or are believed to be repeatedly infringing the rights of copyright holders. If you believe your copyright or other intellectual property right is being infringed, misappropriated, or otherwise violated by a user of the Services, or you believe such a claim has been unfairly made against your account, please see the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation’s Copyright & Intellectual Property Policy [1] .
terms_conditions.Severability: 2.13.1. Severability. If any provision of this Agreement is found by a court of competent jurisdiction or arbitrator to be illegal, void, or unenforceable, the unenforceable provision will be modified so as to render it enforceable and effective to the maximum extent possible in order to effect the intention of the provision.
terms_conditions.Notices: 2.13.2. Notices. Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation is located at 15414 24th Ave Surrey BC V4B 2J3 Canada. You may contact the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation by sending correspondence to that address or emailing info@myreferralnetwork.ca
terms_conditions.Amendments: 2.13.3. Amendments to The Agreement. We may update the Agreement, including these Terms, at any time, in our sole discretion. If we do so, we will let you know either by posting the updated Agreement on the Sites or through other communications. It is important that you review the Agreement, including these Terms, whenever we update it or you use the Services. If you continue to use the Services after we have posted an updated Agreement, you are agreeing to be bound by the updated Agreement. If you do not agree to be bound by the updated Agreement, then, except as otherwise provided in Section 2.13.9, you may not use the Services anymore. Because our Services are evolving over time we may change or discontinue all or any part of the Services, at any time and without notice, at our sole discretion.
terms_conditions.No_Waiver: 2.13.4. No Waiver. Our failure to act with respect to a breach of this Agreement or any term or condition herein by you or others does not waive our right to act with respect to that breach or subsequent similar or other breaches.
terms_conditions.Assignment: 2.13.5. Assignment and Delegation. You may not assign or delegate any rights or obligations under this Agreement. Any purported assignment or delegation by you shall be ineffective. We may freely assign or delegate all rights and obligations under this Agreement, fully or partially, without notice to you. We may also substitute, by way of unilateral novation, effective upon notice to you, a Company for any third party that assumes our rights and obligations under this Agreement.
terms_conditions.Alpha: 2.13.6. Alpha and Beta Testing. The Services include any alpha or beta testing or other evaluation or use of products and services, features, functionality, and all components thereof (whether in final or pre-release form) that we may conduct ('Testing'). Except to the extent otherwise provided in another agreement between you and the applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation, your participation in any Testing and use of any data, content, information, or other materials in connection with such Testing shall be subject to this Agreement.
terms_conditions.International: 2.13.7. International Matters. Unless otherwise stated in the applicable Services Addendum, each Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation is controlled and operated from Canadian offices. We make no representation that the Services are appropriate or available for use in any particular country or location. If you choose to access, view, or use the Services, you do so on your own initiative and you are responsible for compliance with local laws, if and to the extent local laws are applicable. No Services, including software, may be downloaded or otherwise exported or re-exported in violation of any applicable law, rule, regulation, or export or import control.
terms_conditions.Governing: 2.13.8. Governing Law.Except as otherwise provided in Section 2.13.9, you hereby accept and submit to the personal jurisdiction of the applicable courts in accordance with this Section 2.13.8 with respect to any legal actions, suits or proceedings, and waive any jurisdictional or venue defenses otherwise available. The International Sale of Goods Act (British Columbia) and the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods, will not apply in any way to this Agreement or to the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.
terms_conditions.For_Users: 2.13.8.1. For Users Who Are Residents of the United States.This Agreement, any related matters, and any Claims arising under or related thereto (whether for breach of contract, tortious conduct or otherwise) will be governed by the Federal Arbitration Act, federal arbitration law, and the laws of the State of Washington, without reference to its conflicts of law principles. The exclusive jurisdiction for all Claims that you and the Redfin Companies are not required to arbitrate will be the state and federal courts of King County, Washington.
terms_conditions.Who_Are: 2.13.8.2. For Users Who Are Residents of Canada. This Agreement, any related matters, and any Claims arising under or related thereto (whether for breach of contract, tortious conduct or otherwise) will be governed by the laws of the Province of British Columbia and the laws of Canada applicable therein, without reference to its conflicts of law principles. The exclusive jurisdiction for all such Claims will be the courts of the City of Vancouver in the Province of British Columbia.
terms_conditions.Dispute: 2.13.9. Dispute Resolution. THIS SECTION 2.13.9 APPLIES TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, AND IS VOID WHERE PROHIBITED BY LAW. This arbitration provision shall survive termination of the Agreement.
terms_conditions.Informal: 2.13.9.1. Informal Negotiations**.** To expedite resolution and reduce the cost of a Claim, you and the applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation agree to first attempt to negotiate any Claim (except those Claims expressly excluded below) informally for at least thirty (30) days before initiating any arbitration or court proceeding. Such informal negotiations will commence upon written notice. Your address for such notices is your personal home address, if provided by you, with an email copy to the email address you may have provided to such Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation. If necessary to preserve a Claim under any applicable statute of limitations, you or the applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation may initiate arbitration while engaging in the informal negotiations.
terms_conditions.Binding: 2.13.9.2. Binding Arbitration and Class Action Waiver**. Subject to Section 2.13.9.3, you and the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation agree that any Claim between you and any My Referral Network or Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation will be resolved solely by binding, individual arbitration and not in a class, representative or consolidated action or proceeding.** This Section 2.13.9 is governed, in all respects, both procedurally and substantively, by the United States Federal Arbitration Act. You and the applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation agree that you are each waiving the right to a trial by jury or to participate in a class action.
terms_conditions.YOU: YOU AND Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation AGREE THAT EACH MAY BRING CLAIMS AGAINST THE OTHER ONLY IN YOUR OR ITS INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY, AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE PROCEEDING. Further, if the parties' Claim is resolved through arbitration, the arbitrator may not consolidate another person's claims with your claims, and may not otherwise preside over any form of a representative or class proceeding (the two foregoing sentences shall constitute the 'Class Action Waiver'. If this Class Action Waiver is found to be unenforceable, then the entirety of this Section 2.13.9 shall be null and void.
terms_conditions.SUBJECT: SUBJECT TO THE ABOVE THE PARTIES HEREBY WAIVE ANY RIGHTS THEY MAY HAVE TO TRIAL BY JURY IN REGARD TO CLAIMS COVERED BY THIS AGREEMENT.
terms_conditions.provision: If any other provision of this Section 2.13.9 requiring that Claims be brought only on an individual basis and not on a class, collective, or representative basis, is determined to be invalid or unenforceable with respect to any particular Claim, then that Claim shall not proceed in arbitration but rather will be resolved in a court of competent jurisdiction subject to Section 2.13.8. If that happens, however, the arbitration provisions in this Section 2.13.9 will still be fully enforceable as to all other Claims, which must be resolved in arbitration on an individual basis. Any arbitrable Claims will be resolved before non-arbitrable Claims, which the parties will jointly request to be stayed pending the conclusion of arbitration.
terms_conditions.Exceptions: 2.13.9.3. Exceptions and Opt-Out. Nothing in this Section 2.13.9 precludes any party from filing or participating in administrative proceedings before state, provincial/territorial, or federal agencies to address alleged violations of law enforced by those agencies. Further, to the extent a party would have to file a timely administrative charge or complaint as a prerequisite to filing a Claim in court, the party must do the same before submitting a Claim to arbitration under this Agreement. Upon receipt of a right-to-sue letter or similar administrative determination, however, the Claim can only be resolved in individual arbitration pursuant to the terms of this Agreement.
terms_conditions.Section: This Section 2.13.9 also does not prevent any party from applying to a court of competent jurisdiction for any interim or provisional relief available under the law that is necessary to protect the rights of that party, pending the establishment of the arbitral tribunal. This Section 2.13.9 further does not prevent any party from filing any Claim that otherwise qualifies in small claims court on an individual basis.
terms_conditions.addition: In addition, you will retain the right to opt out of arbitration entirely and litigate any Claim if you provide the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation with whom you are entering into this Agreement with written notice of your desire to do soby email at info@myreferralnetwork.ca or by regular mail at 15414 24th Ave Surrey BC V4P 2J3 Canada, within thirty (30) days following the date you first agree to this Agreement.
terms_conditions.Equitable: 2.13.9.4. Equitable Remedies**.** Except for individual Claims brought in small claims court, the arbitrator shall determine all issues of liability on the merits of any Claim asserted by you or the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation, and may award declaratory or injunctive relief only in favor of the individual party seeking relief and only to the extent necessary to provide relief warranted by that party's individual Claim. To the extent that you or Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation prevail on a Claim in arbitration and seek injunctive relief that has the primary purpose and effect of prohibiting unlawful acts that threaten future injury to the general public, the entitlement and extent of such relief must be litigated in a civil court of competent jurisdiction, subject to Section 2.13.8 and not in arbitration. The parties agree that litigation of any issues of public injunctive relief shall be stayed pending the outcome of the merits of any individual Claims in arbitration.
terms_conditions.Rules: 2.13.9.5. Rules and Logistics Governing Arbitration. The arbitration will be conducted by the AAA under its AAA Rules then in effect, except as modified by these Terms. The AAA Rules are available at www.adr.org or by calling 1-800-778-7879. A party who wishes to start arbitration must submit a written Demand for Arbitration to AAA and give notice to the other party as specified in the AAA Rules. The AAA provides a form Demand for Arbitration at www.adr.org
terms_conditions.your: If your claim is for U.S. $10,000 or less, you may choose whether the arbitration will be conducted solely on the basis of documents submitted to the arbitrator, through a telephonic or video-conference hearing, or by an in-person hearing as established by the AAA Rules. If your claim exceeds U.S. $10,000, the right to a hearing will be determined by the AAA Rules. Any arbitration hearings will take place in the county (or parish) where you live, unless we both agree to a different location. The parties agree that the arbitrator shall have exclusive authority to decide all issues relating to the interpretation, applicability, enforceability and scope of this arbitration agreement.
terms_conditions.Arbitration: 2.13.9.6. Arbitration Costs. Payment of all filing, administration and arbitrator fees will be governed by the AAA Rules. The applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation will pay for all filing, administration and arbitrator fees and expenses if your Claim is for less than $10,000, unless the arbitrator finds your Claim frivolous. If a Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation prevails in arbitration, such Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation will pay all of its own attorneys' fees and costs and will not seek to recover them from you. If you prevail in arbitration you will be entitled to an award of attorneys' fees and expenses to the extent provided under applicable law.
terms_conditions.Delivery: 2.13.9.7. Delivery of Demand for Arbitration.A demand for arbitration must be in writing and delivered by hand or first-class mail to the other party within the applicable statute of limitations period. Any demand for arbitration shall be provided to the applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation pursuant to Section 2.13.2. Any demand for arbitration made by a Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation shall be provided to the last address on file with the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation. The arbitrator shall resolve all disputes regarding the timeliness or propriety of the demand for arbitration.
terms_conditions.Effect: 2.13.9.8. Effect of Changes on Arbitration. Notwithstanding Section 2.13.3 above, if we change any of the terms of this Section 2.13.9 after the date you first accepted these Terms (or accepted any subsequent changes to these Terms), you may reject any such change by sending us written notice (including by email to info@peddemors.ca within thirty (30) days of the date such change became effective, as indicated in the 'Last Updated' date above or in the date of our email to you notifying you of such change. By rejecting any change, you are agreeing that you will arbitrate any Claim between you and a Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation in accordance with the terms of this Section 2.13.9 as of the date you first accepted these Terms (or accepted any subsequent changes to these Terms).
terms_conditions.Injunctive: 2.13.10. No Injunctive Relief. In no event shall you seek or be entitled to rescission, injunctive or other equitable relief, or to enjoin or restrain the operation of the Services.
terms_conditions.Entire: 2.13.11. Entire Agreement. You agree that this Agreement constitutes the entire, complete, and exclusive agreement between you and each Company regarding the Services and supersedes all prior agreements and understandings, whether written or oral, or whether established by custom, practice, policy or precedent, with respect to the subject matter of this Agreement. You also may be subject to additional terms and conditions that may apply when you use or receive certain Services, which are reflected in the applicable Services Addendum or otherwise communicated to you by the applicable Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation.
terms_conditions.Corporation: Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation

terms_conditions.Real: It is Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation 's policy, in appropriate circumstances and at its discretion, to disable and/or terminate the accounts of users who repeatedly infringe or are repeatedly charged with infringing the copyrights or other intellectual property rights of others.
terms_conditions.accordance: In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998, the text of which may be found on the U.S. Copyright Office website at http://www.copyright.gov/legislation/dmca.pdf, Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement committed using the Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation ' websites and mobile applications (the 'Sites') that are reported to Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation 's Designated Copyright Agent, identified in the sample notice below.

Upon receipt of the Notice as described below, Stewart Peddemors Personal Real Estate Corporation will take whatever action, in its sole discretion, it deems appropriate, including removal of the challenged material from the Sites.

terms_conditions.material: Identify the material that you claim is infringing (or to be the subject of infringing activity) and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit us to locate the material, including at a minimum, if applicable, the URL of the link shown on the Site(s) where such material may be found.

terms_conditions.Include: Include both of the following statements in the body of the Notice:
terms_conditions.hereby: I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that the disputed use of the copyrighted material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law (e.g., as a fair use).

user_agreement.any_user: Any user who signs up for the website and uses the website to refer or ask for a referral for themselves or clients when referring to and from agents using the System, 25% of the gross commission earned by the agent will be paid to the referring agent. Agents can negotiate a separate agreement when working with each other but the agreed amount must be endorsed by both the referring agent and the receiving agent. If no agreement on the referral amount can be reached the amount shall be 25%.

create_request.This_website_is: This website is free to use for the Public and Realtors alike. If you are looking for someone in another City or Neighbourhood to help you or your clients, this web site is a quick resource to find someone who works in the neighbourhood you want. Just use the map or quick search to find your desired City or neighbourhood and a real estate agent who works there will be shown to you and you can connect with them in one click. They will be contacted and get back to you as soon as they can.
create_request.The_Realtors_on: The Realtors on this site have all been reviewed by their peers and have been recommended as someone you can trust to work with. Any concerns you can reach out to us and we are happy to assist you. We hope you enjoy the use of the site.
create_request.name: Name
create_request.please_enter_10_digit_phone_no: Phone number should be greater than 10 digits
create_request.please_enter_8_to_15_digit_phone_no: Please enter 8 to 15 digit phone No
create_request.i_want_you_to_help_me_in: I want you to help me in (Choose up to  20 FSA ( Postal Code) areas serve):

subagent.For_only: For only $10.00 a year and you can create your own referral network map and keep it in this handy tool.You will always have a great network of agents to recommend to your friends and clients. You will look like a star to introduce them to great agents across the country. There is Realtors in every neighbourhood across Canada available for you to use or change them to your own referral partner.All the agents in the list have been recommended by fellow Realtors. Your own network will be on themap and they will always be there for you. Any updates of information will be updated for you so the most recent information about your network partners will always be close at hand
subagent.all_you_have: All you have to do is : Fill in all the information required on the sign up form. Fill in all the FSA areas (First three digits of a postal code ie A4A) that you wish to serve. This will help you get more referrals down the road and maybe one day be the face on the public map.
subagent.once_you_agree: Once you Agree and Certify the information is correct, pay the $10.00 you will be approved and, on your way, to create your own map of agents across Canada.
subagent.welcome_from_the_My_Referral_Network_Tea: Welcome from the My Referral Network Team
subagent.you_have_been_Invited_to_join_My_Referra: You have been Invited to join My Referral Network
subagent.your_friend_in_real_estate: Your friend in Real Estate has asked you to be part of their network. This is a free service to Realtors to connect with their friends. We do not get involved in the referral transactions between agents. We just help you stay connected. If you check us out and want to join in, it is only $10.00 for the year and you can create your own referral network and keep it in this handy tool
subagent.all_you_have_to_do_is: All you have to do is
subagent.fill_in_all_the_information_required: Fill in all the information required. We suggest to fill in the Short Bio for sure. Also don’t be a bubble head. Upload a picture to be on the map. Fill in all the FSA areas you wish to serve. This will help you get more referrals down the road. Agree and Certify the information is correct
subagent.welcome_from_the_my_referral_network_tea: Welcome from the My Referral Network Team

JoinUs.title: Join Us
JoinUs.i_want_you_to_help_me_in: I want you to help me in (Choose up to  20 FSA ( Postal Code) areas serve):

ideas.How_do_you: How do you set up your go to network
ideas.It_does_take_time: It does take time as you have to build up your relationships with genuine efforts to get to know the people in your network and for them to get to know you. It is not all about you getting business it is about sharing. Send out invites to meet when you are out of your area to meet other agents in person. Make your holiday and great time to meet new friends in other area who can share their knowledge of the area you are visiting and get more out of you vacation. Staying in contact of your network is important. Being regular and meaningful in your contacts. It will be rewarding as you meet more new people in person and how much you can reward each other with networking and friendship

meet_refferals.why_should: Why should you meet Referral Agents
meet_refferals.there_is: There is a need to meet agents across Canada in areas that we don’t serve. It is good to meet referral agents so you can get to know them before sending your client or friends to people you don’t know. By meeting referral agents, you get to know who they are and how they run their business. You can find out their values and specialities so they will be able to help out your clients and friends no matter the need. Not every person is the right fit and by meeting more referral agents you will be a better friends and agent by recommending people that are the right fit. The other advantage of meeting referral agents is that you can develop a bond with agents across all regions and work with them to help yourself in your profession by being able to ask questions, get ideas and help your network grow

aboutUS.title: About US
aboutUS.content: We are a groups of Real Estate agents that love passing it forward. Setting up newer agents with a full network of great agents in all areas of the country was one of the goals. The other was so that agents could stay in contact and find their friends and referral partners easily. A little bit of paying it forward for the good luck and fortunate acquaintances that have come to us in the past. WE have been fortunate to do well and happy to help others do the same. There is a small cost to keep things going so those who do join in get a great value and make the system successful by their support. The system being supported by all those who join in will help pass it forward as the participation of the agents and building their network will help the system continue to be relevant and work well for everyone. We all hope you enjoy the use of the system and that you find good value for your business and staying in contact with your friends. You can reach out to us through the contact page at any time.
